price: 27. Waxaan horay u hallignay wixii hareerihiinna ahaa ee magaalooyin,  waxaana ugu celcelinnay Aayadaha (digniinaha) bal inay (ka) soo noqdaan (gaalnimada iyo denbiyada).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā mā ḥawlakum mina al-qurā waṣarrafnā al-āyāti laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
